info.title: Twilio SIP Credential Lists API
info.description: Twilio is a cloud communications Infrastructure as a Service(IaaS) company based in San Francisco, California. Twilio allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls and send and receive text messages using its web service APIs. Twilio's services are accessed over HTTP and are billed based on usage.

delete.description: Remove a Credential from a CredentialList.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

get.description: Get a specific Credential in a list. Though a password is stored for each username in your list, the password is not returned to protect your password. If you cannot remember your password, you will need to POST to this resource to update it.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

post.description: Change the password of a Credential record.nnIf the change is successful, Twilio will respond with the Credential record but will not include the password in the response.n

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

get.description: Get the list of Credentials in a CredentialList. The passwords for the Credentials are intentionally not returned so as to protect them.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

post.description: Add a Credential to the CredentialList.nnWhen creating a Credential, you will POST both a username and password, but only receive the username back in the response. The password is intentionally not returned so as to protect it.n

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

delete.description: Delete a CredentialList from your account. It can only be deleted if no domains are mapped to it. If you attempt to delete one that is mapped to a domain, you will receive an error.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

post.description: Change the FriendlyName of the list

get.description: Gets a list of Credential Lists for an account
